name: Smiths Group plc
bossPosition: Senior Vice President Global Government Relations
membership: Eucomed / European Organisation for Security / British Chamber of Commerce in Belgium / European Sealing Association
goal:
Smiths Group is a global leader in the development, application and transformation of state-of-the-art technology into products and services that meet our customers’ evolving needs and help make the world safer, healthier and more productive.
Smiths Group has five divisions - John Crane, Smiths Medical, Smiths Detection, Smiths Interconnect and Flex-Tek.
They are focused on the threat & contraband detection, medical devices, energy, communications and engineered components markets worldwide. Our customers range from governments and their agencies, to hospitals, petrochemical companies and equipment manufacturers and service providers in various sectors around the world.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Revision of the medical device directive / Aviation Security Legislation / Land Transport Security / Euro V and VI Emissions Regulations / CBRNE / Standardisation / Climate change and energy policies / Trade Agreements
